items.title: Recruit and hire employees
items.description: Manage the full recruitment process from job posting to candidate selection and onboarding.

items.title: Develop HR policies
items.description: Create and update company policies, procedures, and employee handbook guidelines.

items.title: Manage employee relations
items.description: Handle workplace conflicts, grievances, and maintain positive employee relationships.

items.title: Process payroll
items.description: Calculate wages, deductions, and benefits to ensure accurate and timely employee payments.

items.title: Conduct performance reviews
items.description: Coordinate annual reviews, goal setting, and performance improvement plans with managers.

items.title: Ensure legal compliance
items.description: Monitor employment laws and regulations to maintain company compliance and avoid violations.

items.title: Organize training programs
items.description: Plan and coordinate employee development, skills training, and professional growth initiatives.

items.title: Maintain employee records
items.description: Keep accurate personnel files, documentation, and confidential employee information secure.

items.title: Administer employee benefits
items.description: Manage health insurance, retirement plans, and other employee benefit programs.

items.title: Handle disciplinary actions
items.description: Investigate misconduct, document violations, and implement appropriate corrective measures.

items.title: Coordinate employee surveys
items.description: Conduct engagement surveys and analyze feedback to improve workplace culture and satisfaction.

items.title: Manage workforce planning
items.description: Analyze staffing needs, forecast hiring requirements, and plan organizational structure changes.

items.title: Process leave requests
items.description: Handle vacation, sick leave, and FMLA requests while ensuring adequate coverage.

items.title: Conduct exit interviews
items.description: Interview departing employees to gather feedback and identify retention improvement opportunities.

items.title: Generate HR reports
items.description: Create regular reports on turnover, diversity, compensation, and other HR metrics.

items.title: Coordinate employee onboarding
items.description: Facilitate new hire orientation, documentation completion, and integration into company culture.

items.title: Manage compensation programs
items.description: Develop salary structures, conduct pay equity analyses, and manage merit increase processes.

items.title: Handle workers compensation
items.description: Manage workplace injury claims, return-to-work programs, and safety compliance requirements.

items.title: Facilitate team building
items.description: Organize team activities, company events, and initiatives to improve employee engagement.

items.title: Analyze HR metrics
items.description: Review workforce analytics, retention rates, and performance data to identify trends and improvements.

items.title: Manage vendor relationships
items.description: Coordinate with benefits providers, recruitment agencies, and other HR service vendors.

items.title: Implement diversity programs
items.description: Develop and execute diversity, equity, and inclusion initiatives throughout the organization.
